item.title: Boy, 15, charged months after teens killed in car crash in Orbost
item.description: <p>Aï»¿ 15-year-old boy has been charged after a car crash in a regional Victorian town earlier this year left two other teenagers dead.</p>

item.title: Victoria's overhauled voluntary assisted laws give 'dignity' to those suffering, says Premier
item.description: <p>There have been 13 proposed amendments to the current legislation that was introduced in 2017.</p>

item.title: Federal government releases first ad ahead of looming under-16 social media ban
item.description: <p>Platforms included in the ban are still not yet final.</p>

item.title: Mount Buffalo National Park reopens despite ongoing search for accused gunman Dezi Freeman
item.description: <p>Police say the search for the 56-year-old is not over despite admitting they are unsure if he is even alive.</p>
